org.forgerock.openam.core

Class CoreWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.CoreWrapper

  • public class CoreWrapper
extends Object
    A wrapper around core utility class like, AMAuthUtils and IdUtils to facilitate testing.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      CoreWrapper()

      • getRealmFromRealmQualifiedData

        public String getRealmFromRealmQualifiedData(String realmQualifiedData)
        Returns the Realm name from Realm qualified data.
        Parameters:
        realmQualifiedData - Realm qualified data. This could be Realm qualified authentication scheme or authentication level or service.
        Returns:
        String representing realm name.

      • getAuthenticatedLevels

        public Set<String> getAuthenticatedLevels(SSOToken token)
                                   throws SSOException
        Returns the set of all authenticated levels.
        Parameters:
        token - valid user SSOToken.
        Returns:
        Set containing String values representing levels.
        Throws:
        SSOException - if token.getProperty() fails.

      • getIdentity

        public AMIdentity getIdentity(SSOToken token)
                       throws IdRepoException,
                              SSOException
        Returns a handle of the Identity object based on the SSO Token passed in (AMIdentity object of the user who is authenticated).
        Parameters:
        token - Single sign on token of user.
        Returns:
        Identity object.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - If there are repository related error conditions.
        SSOException - If user's single sign on token is invalid.

      • getIdentity

        public AMIdentity getIdentity(SSOToken token,
                              String univId)
                       throws IdRepoException,
                              SSOException
        Returns an AMIdentity object, if provided with a string identifier for the object.
        Parameters:
        token - SSOToken of the administrator.
        univId - String representation of the identity.
        Returns:
        Identity object.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException
        SSOException

      • destroyToken

        public void destroyToken(SSOToken token)
                  throws SSOException
        Destroys a single sign on token.
        Parameters:
        token - The single sign on token object to be destroyed.
        Throws:
        SSOException - If there was an error while destroying the token, or the corresponding session reached its maximum session/idle time, or the session was destroyed.

      • getAdminToken

        public SSOToken getAdminToken()
        Returns a cached instance AdminTokenAction.
        Returns:
        instance of AdminTokenAction.

      • isValidFQDN

        public boolean isValidFQDN(String hostname)
        Validates that the hostname is a valid FQDN that is known to OpenAM.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The FQDN to test.
        Returns:
        true if the FQDN is valid.

        Organization mapping to that identifier.
        Throws:

      • convertOrgNameToRealmName

        public String convertOrgNameToRealmName(String orgName)
        Returns realm name in "/" separated format for the provided realm/organization name in DN format.
        Parameters:
        orgName - Name of organization.
        Returns:
        DN format "/" separated realm name of organization name.

      • convertRealmNameToOrgName

        public String convertRealmNameToOrgName(String realm)
        Returns realm name in DN format for the provided realm/organization name in "/" separated format.
        Parameters:
        realm - DN format "/" separated realm name of organization name.
        Returns:
        The realm in DN format.

      • getRealmFromPolicyAdvice

        public String getRealmFromPolicyAdvice(String advice)
        Parses the policy condition advice and checks for realm advices.
        Parameters:
        advice - The policy advice XML.
        Returns:
        The realm defined in the policy advice, if defined, or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if more than one realm is defined within the advice.

      • getCookieDomainsForRequest

        public Collection<String> getCookieDomainsForRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the configured cookie domains for the server matching the current request's domains.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The matching cookie domains for the current request.

      • getIdentity

        public AMIdentity getIdentity(String username,
                              String realm)
        Gets the AMIdentity of a user with username equal to username that exists in realm
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user to get.
        realm - realm the user belongs to.
        Returns:
        The AMIdentity of user with username equal to username.

      • getServiceConfigManager

                                                    SSOToken token)
                                             throws SSOException,
                                                    SMSException
        Gets a ServiceConfigManager for the given service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The name of the service.
        token - The token to use.
        Returns:
        The service config manager.
        Throws:
        SSOException
        SMSException
